histore.archive.store.mem.base module¶

Implementation of a basic archive store that maintains all data in main memory. Archive information is not persisted.

class histore.archive.store.mem.base.VolatileArchiveStore(primary_key: Optional[List[int]] = None)¶

Bases: histore.archive.store.base.ArchiveStore

Archive store that keeps all archive related information in main memory. The store is volatile as no information is persisted on disk.

commit(schema: histore.archive.schema.ArchiveSchema, writer: histore.archive.store.mem.writer.ArchiveBuffer, snapshots: histore.archive.snapshot.SnapshotListing)¶

Commit an updated dataset archive.

The modified components of the archive are given as the three arguments of this method.

Parameters

  • schema (histore.archive.schema.ArchiveSchema) – Schema history for the new archive version.

  • writer (histore.archive.store.mem.writer.ArchiveBuffer) – Buffer containing the modified archive rows.

  • snapshots (histore.archive.snapshot.SnapshotListing) – Snapshot listing for the modified archive.

get_reader() → histore.archive.store.mem.reader.BufferedReader¶

Get the row reader for this archive.

Returns

Return type

histore.archive.store.mem.BufferedReader

get_schema() → histore.archive.schema.ArchiveSchema¶

Get the schema history for the archived dataset.

Returns

Return type

histore.archive.schema.ArchiveSchema

get_snapshots() → histore.archive.snapshot.SnapshotListing¶

Get listing of all snapshots in the archive.

Returns

Return type

histore.archive.snapshot.SnapshotListing

get_writer() → histore.archive.store.mem.writer.ArchiveBuffer¶

Get a a new archive buffer to maintain rows for a new archive version.

Returns

Return type

histore.archive.store.mem.ArchiveBuffer

is_empty()¶

True if the archive does not contain any snapshots yet.

Returns

Return type

bool

primary_key() → List[int]¶

Get the list of identifier for the primary key column(s).

Returns None if the archive is not keyed by a primary key.

Returns

Return type

list of int

rollback(schema: histore.archive.schema.ArchiveSchema, writer: histore.archive.store.mem.writer.ArchiveBuffer, version: int)¶

Store the archive after it has been rolled back to a previous version.

The archive schema and archive writer contain the modified schema and rows after the rollback.

Parameters

  • schema (histore.archive.schema.ArchiveSchema) – Schema history for the previous archive version.

  • writer (histore.archive.store.mem.writer.ArchiveBuffer) – Instance of the archive writer class returned by this store that was used to output the rows of the previous archive version.

  • version (int) – Unique version identifier for the rollback snapshot.
